page.title: 11SHOPPING FACILITIES
page.content: There are only two shops in our area. One at Brown's Garage and one at Duton Hill.We did a survey asking which are the main shopping areas people use. Dunmow and Bishop's Stortford were the most popular.Some people buy their daily needs from mobile shops.There are seven different types.They are: Milkman,Video van,Ice-cream, Fruit'n'Veg, Baker,Fish'n'Chip van and the Mobile Library. Each delivery or Mobile shop,has its own type of vehicle specially made for the job. Some come in the morning, some in the afternoon.The Milkman,Postman, and Paper boy come to the door, others stop in a certain place and customers go to them.Some delivery people wear a uniform,Postman, Milkman, Baker, ice cream and Fish'n'Chips do,the others don't.
